title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: South Park, day, Kyle's house. Kyle is playing football with Ike on the front lawn. The football rests in front of Ike

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Come on. Throw the football, Ike.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: No on dahdo.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Dude!  You're not gonna believe what Cartman has!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hepatitis B?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: No, dickhole. Four tickets, 28th row, for the Raging Pussies!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: ...You got Raging Pussies tickets??

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: We're going tomorrow night! Cartman's got the bus schedule all figured out!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hold on. I'll be right back.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kyle's house, living room. On the sofa Gerald reads a newspaper, Sheila reads a book. Kyle rushes up to them

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Mom, Dad, can I go with the guys to see the Raging Pussies?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: No, Kyle.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: But all the guys are going!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kyle, you're not old enough, and those concerts are dangerous and vile.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: But Mom, I-

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: The answer is no, Kyle!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Ugh!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kyle's house, front lawn. Kyle rejoins the boys

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: My parents said I can't go.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Well, of course your parents said you can't go!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Dummy, you don't ask if you can go! I'm telling my parents I'm staying at Stan's house, Stan's telling his parents he's staying at Kenny's house, and Kenny's not telling his parents anything, 'cause they're alcoholics and they don't care!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: (Yeah!)

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Ah. Oh, now I already told them.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Well, I guess you're screwed, then.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: No! It's alright! Just give me some time to work on them. I'll see you guys later.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kyle's house, living room. Kyle tries to persuade his parents

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: ...But what if I do a bunchof chores around the house? Come on, you're being unfair!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Alright. Fine, Kyle, you can go to the Raging Pussies concert if you clean out the garage, shovel the driveway and bring democracy to Cuba!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: What's Cuba?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: A communist country run by a dictator named Fidel Castro.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: And do I have to shovel the whole driveway, or just the side the car is on?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: The whole thing.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hoh, geez.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kyle's house, his bedroom, night. He's at his desk writing a letter. He's done his other chores

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: thinks

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: I am an eight-year-old American boy who lives in South Park.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Centro Nacional de Cuba. Castro, flanked by an armed guard on each side, is at his desk reading Kyle's letter

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: And if I had just one wish, just one wish in the whole world,

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: If I had one wish it'd be for Cuba to change.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Castro sees a drawing of a sad Kyle holding a flower, which fades to a sad Kyle writing his letter

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: Because I think that all the Cubans are in pain

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: All the joy in the world, from sea to shining sea

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kyle finishes a drawing of a sad rainbow coalition atop a world globe

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: Doesn't mean a thing if Cubans aren't free

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Castro see a drawing of a sad Kyle inside a small house

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: I just can't be very happy, that's certain

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: A picture of Kyle replaces his self-portrait on the paper

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: Not as long as your Cubans are hurtin'

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kyle finishes one last drawing of himself, which Castro sees last

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: Oh, won't you search your soul and find a way to change your
text: mind?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: That is my one and only wish.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: ¡¡Llamen a todos junto!!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kyle's house, living room, next day. He and his parents watch TV and a news brief comes on. Kyle smiles, his parents are stuned

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: Reporter	Once again, this does marks the end of Communism in
text: Cuba. Cuban dictator Fidel Castro claims he was finally convinced by a young boy's letter. [A shot of Kyle behind a wooden fence comes up] Now the country is again open to American tourism. [shot of Sheila and Gerald stunned] Plans can finally resume for Knott's Berry Farm Cuba. [Sheila and Gerald look at each other]

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I did it! Now I can go to the Raging Pussies!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: No you can't!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: What??

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kyle, your mother and I don't want you going to the Raging Pussies concert! We gave you a chore that we thought was impossible. You weren't supposed to actually do it.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: But I did! Ah, I brought -democracy to Cuba!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: We know, Kyle, but we just don't want you going to their concert.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: But that's not fair! You lied to me!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kyle, perhaps we handled this wrong, buh- but you need to understand that we don't want-

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: What I understand is that you totally screwed me over!! So why should I have to listen to you?!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Because we're your parents!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: We I wish I didn't have any parents!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kyle!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kenny's house, front steps. Stan, Kyle, and Cartman sit on the steps as Kenny plays on the lawn with a fire truck

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: It's so unfair! How can my parents do that to me?!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Parents can be pretty cruel sometimes, dude. They get off on it.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: They're evil! I WISH I DIDN'T HAVE ANY PARENTS!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Well, you... could make them... go away for a while.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: How?!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Well, I mean, you... could... call the police and have them take your parents away.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: The police?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yeah, I saw it on TV. All you gotta do is call the police and say that your parents both molestered you.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: What's that?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I don't know, but it works. When I wanted to get rid of my mom's last boyfriend, I just called the police, and said he was molestering me, and I haven't seen him for three months.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Wow! Three months without parents!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: (Wow, that is awesome!)

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: But what do the police do to them?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Who cares? My parents deserve whatever they get. They're liars and cheats.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: You have to make it convincing, though, when you call the police. You have to be like,  "my parents molestered me."

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: "My parents molestered me."

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: No, but you've gotta cry, like this: "My parents molestered me."  And then they'll say somethng like, "Was it a good touch or a bad touch?" and you say  "Ih, it was a good touch" or- no wait,  you say it was a bad touch.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: What's "bad touch"?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Something about a swimsuit - I don't remember, but you definitely answer "bad touch."

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Okay, molestered, bad touch.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yeah, And cry.  Oh, he's ready.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kyle's house, front lawn, day. Police and press gather round as the four boys and Ike watch by the driveway. Gerald and Sheila exit the house followed by two policemen. Two reporters try to ask them questions as cameras go off all around them

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh my God, this isn't happening. I would never touch my children like that.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: You do have the right to remain silent, ma'am. I suggest you use that right.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Ugh, pleae, just listen to me!  What about my children? Who will take care of them?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh, now you care?! They're going to live with their grandmother.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Their grandmother's been dead for three years.  You're not listenng to me. Kyle, tell these people that your  mother never raped you! Tell them! It's my fault. Say it! Tell them right now!!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: They'll never be able to hurt you again.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Cool, thanks.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Alright, folks. Our work here is done.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Alright!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: [Kyle's house, living room, shot of the hallway and stairs. "Old
text: Time Rock 'N' Roll" plays And so... Kyle slides into view in his hat and underwear, facing away from the camera. He looks left and his sunglasses are shown. As the first words are sung, Kyle faces the camera and lip-syncs to them. With Chinpoko Mon around them, Kenny, Stan, and Cartman jump gleefully up and down on the sofa. In the kitchen Ike sticks a fork into the toaster. Kyle dances some more.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: Next scene is the Raging Pussies concert outside and inside a
text: stadum. The four boys are in the audience, and Kyle is still in underwear.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: Next scene shows kids from all over descend on Kyle's house for
text: a party at night. Everyone dances inside, some kids are eating pizzaand Kyle is still in underwear]

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Dude! Having no parents is awesome! I'm gonna say my parents molestered me, too.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hey, yeah! We should all say our parents molestered us!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yeah, uh huh, woo hoo!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: [Stan's house, living room. He's on the phone crying. Next scene,
text: his parents are hauled off by five cops. Shelley is shocked to see her parents go, but Stan begins to dance. She looks at him angrily and begins to pull her fist back. Stan stops dancing and points at her. A cop hauls her off. Stan resumes dancing.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: Cartman's house, front door. The door opens and Liane is hauled
text: out, then one man, then Chef. Cartman appears after them and stops at the door, and waves goodbye to them.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: South Park Elementary, Ms. Choksondik's class. In front of the
text: class, she's hauled off. Then Principal Victoria is taken away, and then Mr. Mackey, as Butters accuses him of somethng to the case worker.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: Four panes appear, with a child in each one calling the police

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Stan's house, day. Stan, Kyle, and Ike sit on the sofa watching TV

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: The following hot presentation is for mature audiences only.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: You guys! Come out here!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Downtown South Park. The sky is a deep blue and the streets are clear of snow. Token, Butters and Kenny stand behind Filmore and his friend. Cartman, Stan, Kyle, Ike, and Clyde

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: What's going on?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: Cartman?	Notice anything? [before them the town sits empty as
text: the sun sits between two mountains in a red sky.] Watch. [takes a stone and throws it hard. It flies through the air and goes through a first-floor window on a building two blocks away]

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: ...Nothing.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yeah, nothing. There's not an adult left in town.  They've all been arrested, and the ones that weren't arrested have moved away because they're scared of being arrested

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Not one adult left?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: ...Then it's ours. The whole town. It's ours.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: The Rockies, some days later. A car winds its way down the winding road in a snow storm

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh, sweetie, I have no idea where we are.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I haven't seen a road marker for miles. What was the last highway we were on?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: There has to be a town around here somewhere.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Maybe you're reading the map wrong.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hey, it was your idea to take the backroads.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: What the?  Oh no. No, no, no, no.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: What's the matter with it?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I have no idea. Oh, we're gonna have to find some help quick. We're not gonna make it more than a couple of miles.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh, look! There's a town up ahead. Smiley Town? That's a strange name.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Well, it'll have to do. It's probably the only town for a hundred miles.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Smiley Town, a beat-up gas station. The car rolls up and the man and woman get out. The woman joins the man on the driver's side of the car.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hello? Is anybody here?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hoh, hahh, can I- help you folks?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: ...Yes, we need a mechanic to look at our car.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh, well-l-l, uh, I'm the mec-hanic, I guess. Woh-what seems to be the problem?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: ...It's... just you here?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: No, uh Craig's here, too.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh, good.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: But he's playing Spaceman right now. Huh. Hey, Craig!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: What?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Look we're in a bit of a spot here! I've got a very important job interview tomorrow morning in Breckenridge, so I have to get my car fixed fast! Is there another garage in town?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Huuuhhhh, no.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: How about a phone? Can we just use the phone?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Phone here doesn't work. Haa-I'm afraid the only phone that does work... is over in Treasure Cove.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Fine! Can you take us there?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: You... sure you wanna go to Treasure Cove?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yes.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Uhh rrreeally are you sure?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yes.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh, alright then.  Uh, show 'em where it is.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Downtown Smiley Town. Craig leads the couple down the streets to a white line running down the center of a cross street

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: This is the end of Smiley Town. The only phone is somehwere in Treasure Cove. If you wanna find it, you're gonna have to cross the white line.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Well, can you help us find the phone, please?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hell no! I'm not crossing the white line.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Why not?!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Alright, let's just... go, Linda. I don't have time for Spaceman Spiff's little games.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Craig.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: What?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: It's Spaceman Craig.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Downtown Treasure Cove. The couple walks into this town to the sound of ominous music. The town looks worse than Smiley Town does.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Carousel.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Nah nah nanah nah!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Look, there's an elementary school Come on, there might be some teachers inside.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: What is that? [the truck turns around and comes back]

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: WAAH [raises a foot to avoid being hit by the truck. The truck
text: goes down the street, then turns around and returns once more, stopping in front of the frightened couple]

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
role: What do you want from us??

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Linda, it's a remote-controlled car. Looks like maybe there's a little camera on it.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Mark, I don't like this.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Relax, Linda, everything's fine.  Ow. Ow.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: What is it?! Acid?!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: No, ud, it's lemon juice.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh God! Are you blind?!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: No, it just really, really, really hurts!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Mark? Mark, look.  Well, hello. What's your name?  What- what do you want?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: We wanna play.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Don't be scared. They're just kids. Where are your parents?!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: We already played with our parents.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: How, we wanna play wit' youuuu.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: ...Okay, I'm scared now, too. That freaked me out.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: We wanna play wit' you!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Get off me!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh God, Mark! Help!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh no! She's crossing the white line!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Whoa!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Spitwads!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Take that, kindergartners!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Ew!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: What the hell is gong on here?!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kindergartners. Treasure Cove is full of them.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Alright, kid! We demand to see an adult this instant!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I got new orders. I'm supposed to take you to see the mayor.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: The mayor! Good! Finally!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Smiley Town City Hall, day. Pictures of Cartman adorn the building and the path to the front door. A large inflatable King Kong floats above the snow and is tethered to the ground below. Craig and Butters liead Mark and Linda into the Mayor's office, where they face Cartman behind the desk, and two other boys. Clyde Frog sits on the desk at Cartman's right side, and his boombox is at left.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hello, Mr. and Mrs. Cotner. Won't you come in, please?  Mr. and Mrs. Cotner, as the mayor of Smiley Town, I would like to ask you a few questions.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: You're the mayor? What the hell is gong on here?! Where are your parents?!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Parents?  Ah, you mean the birth-givers. They're not around.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: No parents in the entire town? What happened to them?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Okay, see, I am the mayor of Smiley Town, and so I will ask the questions around hyah!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Look, just point us to a phone, kid, alright?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Eheh, I'm afraid you'll find all the phones... quite out of service.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: No phones, either? How do you communicate?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Butters, I need an ETA on the car, stat.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Alright, we've had just about enough here! That's the most ridiculous thing I've ever seen! I don't care what little games you kids wanna play, we just want outta here, alright?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: It's gonna be about three days.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: So, it appears that you need me. Which is good, because... I need you, too. Ringy-ding?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I have the job interview of my life in Breckenridge! Just tell me how to get to a phone or a car!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Spitball!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Aaahh!  You sons of bitches!  You see what we're dealing with here. Tonight is Carousel. And they will try to kill one of us. Eh, you two seem to have the uncanny ability to cross the white line. If you help us, we'll get you what you need.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Dividing line at the John Elway Memorial Park. The couple enters the park, Mark on the left side of the line, Linda on the right side

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Mark, are we doing the right thing?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Look! If getting the stupid book will get me a cell phone, I don't care!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I just don't know if you're dealing with these kids the right way.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Well, I told you I can't deal with kids, Linda! That's why I don't want to have children!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hey, I think you'd make a great father.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh, let's not go through this again, Linda. D-  Look, here's the book they've been talking about-  it makes no sense.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: My God! Mark!  What is it??

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: It's a boy.  They... killed him.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: The bastards. Oh, Mark, let's get out of here.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Nah nah nanah nah!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Na-a-ah!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh no!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Mark!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Uh. The fat kid told us to take it.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Treasure Cove Elementary, evening. Inside, Mark and Linda are tied, asleep and backs to each other, next to a bonfire.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Wuh. Aah! Mark! Mark, wake up!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Nah nah nanah nah!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: You guys, stop it!  Sorry about them. Kindergartners are kind of spazzes.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yeah.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Why are you doing this?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: How come you wanna help the fatass?!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Who?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: The fatass. The mayor.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Look, I have the job interview of my life in less than-  -12 hours! I just need a phone, and he said he'd help me if I took your book so you couldn't... kill them anymore.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: You got foolied, outlander! We're the only ones with a working phone. And if you had taken our book, then it's one of us who dies tonight at Carousel!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Uh, how did this all happen? Why do you children live in this town alone?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Because we do. It was like this yesterday, and the day before that.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: But what about before that?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: You mean in the Before time? In the long, long ago?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yes!!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: If we tell you, will you help us stop Fatass?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I'll do anything to get to a phone!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Alright. Everybody gather round. We're gonna tell the story of the Before time again.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: The Before time.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: The story of the Before time.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Way back, in the long long ago, we all lived by the birthgivers' laws. But the birthgivers were unfair. They made us go to bed early and eat broccoli.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yuck, yuck, yuck.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: And so the fatass came up with a way to have all the birthgivers disappear. , by using the magic M word.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Mmmmmmmmmmmmmmm.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Soon we were without power, water, or fresh food. But we tried to survive. Under the guidance of... the Provider.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Provider. Provider.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: The fatass and us disagreed on how to worship the provider. The fatass tried to make us follow his way by making himself the school principal. So we made ourselves the superintendents of school. But then he just made himself the mayor. The town split sides and that's when the Provider got angry.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Boo!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Bwack bwack!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Coosh!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: So now, every night, the Provider must be appeased at Carousel. We need their book so one of ours doesn't die.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Carousel, Carousel.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: We all know that one day, the Provider will set us free. Make everything like it was in the before time. In the long, long ago.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Ah-ah-ah-ah,let me get this straight: if I go get the fat kid's book on the other side of the white line, you'll show me where a cell phone is?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yes. No foolies.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: No foolies.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Treasure Cove Elementary, evening, outside. The couple is still inside

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: No, uh, it's it's it's right out here. Come on.  Linda, I want you to just go back to the car and wait for me, alright? I'll go get that fat kid's book so I can use their phone.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Mark, I'm scared.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I know, but this will all be over soon.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Canyon City Maximum Security Prison, day. Sheila, dressed in prison orange, is brought into a large room to join the other adults, and the door is locked behnd her.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh, Gerald, I haven't seen you for so long!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hello, honey, how has prison been for you?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh, it's awful! Just awful.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Alright parents, let's all take our seats.  My name is Scott Evans, and I am a prison rehabilitation counselor.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Uh, excuse me, but my wife and I honestly never touched our child.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Eh, neither did we.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: We didn't, either.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Enough, enough!  Look, it's obvious we have a lot of emotional issues and personal demons to face here. During your prison time, you will all be spending one hour a day in therapy here with me. What I want you to do is learn to control those sick, sexual urges you have. Now we're gonna try an exercise: I'm gonna confront you with vwhat you lust after most.  Alright parents, now I, I know this is difficult, but I want you to just look at this child. Just try to suppress your urges to rape him. Just think about somethin' else. Think about clouds and beaches. Don't think about his supple, soft little body.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh, that's disgusting!!! Now, now stop this!!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Fight your urges, Mr. Broflovski!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I don't have any urges!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I can't help you if you won't admit you need help!! Now sit down!  Look, I know this is very difficult for all of you. Most of you are still in denial about what you've done! To you it seems you've never raped your children at all! But you did. Help meeee help youuuu. Now let's try again.  Look at this young man. Just look. Don't rape. Fight it. Fight it!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Smiley Town, street. Linda walks out from behnd a van.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh God, God, please just let us out of this place.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I thnk I found the problem, ma'am. A broken window roller-upper.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh no. NO!  Aaaah!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Where is your husband?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Uh, uh...

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Seize her!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Treasure Cove Elementary, evening, school gym. Mark has returned

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Alright, I got the book for you.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Awesu-home!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Now, can I please have the cell phone?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Sure, outlander. I'll get it

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Outlander!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Treasure Cove Elementary, outside. Cartman, holding a taser, leads the Smiley Town members to the school. Linda is bound and gagged, but can still walk

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Outlander! We have your woman! She still lives, outlander! Outlander, her blood was fair!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oo what the heck are you talkin' about?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Butters, calm down, ahright?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Canyon City Maximum Security Prison, day, meeting room.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Okay, so what are some other things that we can do besides molest our children?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: See a movie?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Sure, "see a movie"'s good.  We could see a movie instead of molesting our children. What else?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Make a sweater?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Uh huh. I'll put ah, "knitting, sewing." Who's got another one?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Molest children?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Nonono, we're looking for things to do besides molesting our children.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh. Fishing?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Fishing's good. Uh huh.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: John Elway Memorial Park, night. The two towns meet at the deviding line, Linda with Smiley Town, Mark with Treasure Cove.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I believe you have something of ours, outlander! Give it back, or the female gets it!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Mmrrhhhh!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Heh, heheh.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Rrrmm-mmrrhh!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Give him the book back.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: No. If they have it, one of ours will die for Carousel!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: We're running outu of time! Hand our book over, quick!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Enough of this! You kids are all in big trouble!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: The Provider awakes!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: It's time for Carousel! Haha, your side doesn't have its book, fatass! That means someone on your side is sacrificed tonight.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Aw, damnit! Alright.  It is decided. Butters, your turn.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh, I'm gonna be sacrificed to the Provider!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Stop right there! Nobody's killing anybody tonight!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Be careful, Mark. They'll nake you disappear with the M word.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yeah, we'll call the police and say you molestered us, too.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: What?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I'm here for you, Provider! Uh, take me!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Is that what happened to the adults here?! You lied to the police and said they molested you?! My God, they were your parents!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Parents?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: The birth-givers! Your birthgivers. Don't you remember? They are your providers! Not some statue! And they're not up in some fantastical faraway land now. They're in prison. Probably crying themselves to sleep, cold and lonely and... I'm sure missing you all very, very much.  Your birthgivers took care of you. That's what their laws and their rules were for, because they love you, and they didn't want you to end up living like... th-this!  He won't take care of you. Your parents... your... providers... will.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Parents. Mom. Dad.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh boy, here it comes!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: If you want things to be the way they were in the before time, in the long, long ago, you all need to call the police and tell them you lied about them M word.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: He's right, dude. Things were a lot better with our parents around.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yeah. I guess their rules did have a point. Things have gotten a lot worse in the ten days since they've been gone.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Ten days?? It's only been ten days since they left??

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Take him down.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hey, uh, what are you doin'?? Ha-I'm ready to give myself to Mr. Elway.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Here's our cell phone, dude.  Will you call the police for us?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hey. Looks like you're not so bad with kids after all.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yeah, I guess you're right. Maybe we should have some.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yeah, right. After all this, I'm getting my tubes ties tomorrow!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: South Park, day, neighborhood street. The town has been cleaned up. The kids stand in front of a house waiting for a bus to roll up. Cartman, Stan, Kyle, and Craig hold a banner among them which reads, red letters on yellow background, "Welcome Home, PARENTS!" Butters walks up

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Come on, you guys! Our parents are gonna be back any minute!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Do you think they're gonna pissed at us for lying that they molested us and sending them all to jail for ten days?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Well, they can't be too pissed off. I mean, we made them a banner.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hey, kids.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hey, you guys came back!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Did you make it to your job interview?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yeah. I got the job. You're looking at the new manager of Denny's in Breckenridge.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: And I got my tubes tied.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Alright!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Well, thnaks for everything, you guys. You really helped us see how important parents are.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yeah.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hey! Here they come!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Mom! Dad!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kids!

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: ...Come here, come here.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh, Kyle. Ike, sweetie, you're OK.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Yeah. We're fine.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kyle, we're so sorry for the horrible sexual abuse over the years. But we're all better now.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: But you didn't do anything to me.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Hup, we did. We've come to terms with it through therapy and learned to admit it.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: It won't happen again.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: But, you guys, I-

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oh, Stanley, I wish we could take back all the years of abuse, but we can't.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: We've learned to overcome it, son. You'll see.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: We love you, son, but we only love you in a platonic way from now on.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Oo-what the heck are you talkin' about?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Kenny? Kenny, we're sorry. Where is he?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Everything's gonna be alright now, Jenny.  Come on, let's go home.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Huh.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Huh.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Well, what are you kids gonna do now?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: I dunno.  You guys wanna build a snow igloo?

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Sure.

title: THE WACKY MOLESTATION ADVENTURE
text: Snow igloos kick ass.
